articles.author: ESPN News Services
articles.title: USMNT gets 'wake-up call' in 5-1 rout by Colombia - ESPN
articles.description: Coach Gregg Berhalter said the U.S. men's national soccer team got a "wake-up call" ahead of this summer's Copa America in Saturday's 5-1 humbling by Colombia at FedEx Field in Landover, Maryland.
articles.content: Coach Gregg Berhalter said the United States men's national soccer team got a "wake-up call" ahead of this summer's Copa America in Saturday's 5-1 humbling by Colombia at FedEx Field in Landover, Mar… [+2995 chars]
